Class ColumnChoicesProviderUtil.CompatibleColumnChoicesProvider

java.lang.Object
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.choices.ColumnChoicesProviderUtil.CompatibleColumnChoicesProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
ColumnChoicesProviderUtil.DoubleColumnChoicesProvider, ColumnChoicesProviderUtil.StringColumnChoicesProvider
Enclosing class:
ColumnChoicesProviderUtil
public static class ColumnChoicesProviderUtil.CompatibleColumnChoicesProvider extends Object implements ColumnChoicesProvider
A ChoicesProvider which can be given one or multiple classes extending DataValue and provides the compatible columns of a given spec
